aboutUs.message1: Our company is based on satisfying the needs of customers, both supplyers and buyers.
aboutUs.message2: The main purpose of the company is the export of berries and europallets.
aboutUs.message3: We are waiting for your requests in the contact section.

productsArea.productItem1Desc: Our company deals with the export of berries care sunt that are selectively harvested directly from the forests of Romania.
productsArea.productItem2Desc: Our company imports from abroad precious metals such as gold and diamonds .
productsArea.otherDetails: We sell 22 and 24 karat gold in the form of ingots.
productsArea.descriptionItem3: Our company offers europallets and special pallets for sale
productsArea.waitingFor: We are also waiting for your request for special pallets that are dimensionless.
